decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Condition 28 (Cycle Parking) as attached to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2019/2314 in relation to Block B only. It should also be emphasised that the details hereby approved relate only to the cycle parking provisions and no other details shown on the plans.
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 28 (Cycle Parking - Block B Only) as attached to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2019/2314 dated 28-06-2021 (Development of 4 no. new buildings comprising residential units (in addition to those approved under planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883), a basement extension to Block B, flexible commercial uses (Class E) and associated landscaping, access, car parking and other engineering works)
